strings:
<voice_0x01000952><se_low>King Trode: Ah, <hero>.
I was starting to think you'd got lost!
<se_low>King Trode: Now then, my boy, have you been to church to confess recently, hm?

<se_low>King Trode: Travelling is a dangerous business.
And one fraught with...unfortunate events which one can occasionally end up rather regretting.
<voice_0x01000953><se_low>King Trode: Right, let's go to the waterfall cave and see if we can find that crystal ball.

<voice_0x01000954><se_low>King Trode: Medea and I will be right behind you.
If you have any trouble, feel free to consult us.
<voice_0x01000956><se_low>King Trode: It looks like we've found it.

<voice_0x01000957><se_low>King Trode: Naturally I'd love to come in with you,
but I couldn't possibly put Medea in danger.

<voice_0x01000958><se_low>King Trode: I'm sure you'll do a fine job of finding the
crystal ball without us, <hero>.
We'll be waiting here.
<voice_0x01000959><se_low>King Trode: You be careful in there!
